title: New Law And Regulations Expand California Data Broker Oversight
combined_text: New Law And Regulations Expand California Data Broker Oversight. mondaq.com.
summary: California's SB 362 expands data broker oversight significantly, mandating annual registration and detailed information provision. Data brokers must comply with new erasure request obligations and facilitate consumer access to this data. Failure to comply could result in penalties, impacting data acquisition and usage strategies, with a $200 daily fine.

title: California Amends Data Broker Law | Troutman Pepper Locke
combined_text: California Amends Data Broker Law | Troutman Pepper Locke. jdsupra.com.
summary: California's amended data broker law expands registration requirements, affecting more businesses. The law now requires data brokers to disclose procedures for consumers to correct inaccurate information. Amended law increases penalties for non-compliance, creating a higher risk for data brokers and their partners.
